languages.text: Дух машины пребывает в здравии и готов вознестись с поверхности мира. Никаких улик, указывающих, куда мог бы направиться Ульфар Громогласный, не обнаружено, но опытный разведчик заметил несколько проломленных сугробов, указывающих, куда мог уйти Космический волк.

The machine spirit is in fine form and is ready to ascend from the world's surface. No clues have been found as to Ulfar Thunderlung's intended destination, but a keen-eyed scout sights several disturbed snowdrifts that may indicate the route taken by the Space Wolf.
languages.original_text: Дух машины пребывает в здравии и готов вознестись с поверхности мира. Никаких улик, указывающих, куда мог бы направиться Ульфар Громогласный, не обнаружено, но опытный разведчик заметил несколько проломленных сугробов, указывающих, куда мог уйти Космический волк.

traits.locale_text: The machine spirit is in fine form and is ready to ascend from the world's surface. No clues have been found as to Ulfar Thunderlung's intended destination, but a keen-eyed scout sights several disturbed snowdrifts that may indicate the route taken by the Space Wolf.

The machine spirit is in fine form and is ready to ascend from the world's surface. No clues have been found as to Ulfar Thunderlung's intended destination, but a keen-eyed scout sights several disturbed snowdrifts that may indicate the route taken by the Space Wolf.

The machine spirit is in fine form and is ready to ascend from the world's surface. No clues have been found as to Ulfar Thunderlung's intended destination, but a keen-eyed scout sights several disturbed snowdrifts that may indicate the route taken by the Space Wolf.

The machine spirit is in fine form and is ready to ascend from the world's surface. No clues have been found as to Ulfar Thunderlung's intended destination, but a keen-eyed scout sights several disturbed snowdrifts that may indicate the route taken by the Space Wolf.

languages.text: 穿梭机的机魂状况良好，随时可以升空。至于乌尔法·雷狼的目的地，目前还并没有发现任何线索。不过，一位目光敏锐的侦察兵发现了几处被踩乱的雪堆，乌尔法很可能是从那里经过的。
languages.original_text: The machine spirit is in fine form and is ready to ascend from the world's surface. No clues have been found as to Ulfar Thunderlung's intended destination, but a keen-eyed scout sights several disturbed snowdrifts that may indicate the route taken by the Space Wolf.

traits.locale_text: 穿梭机的机魂状况良好，随时可以升空。至于乌尔法·雷狼的目的地，目前还并没有发现任何线索。不过，一位目光敏锐的侦察兵发现了几处被踩乱的雪堆，乌尔法很可能是从那里经过的。

languages.text: 活発に動く機械精霊は、この星の地表から飛び上がる準備をする。ウルファー・サンダーラングが向かうであろう場所の手がかりは見つかっていないが、鋭い眼力の偵察隊員が乱れた雪壁を見つける。スペースウルフの進軍ルートかもしれない。
languages.original_text: The machine spirit is in fine form and is ready to ascend from the world's surface. No clues have been found as to Ulfar Thunderlung's intended destination, but a keen-eyed scout sights several disturbed snowdrifts that may indicate the route taken by the Space Wolf.

traits.locale_text: 活発に動く機械精霊は、この星の地表から飛び上がる準備をする。ウルファー・サンダーラングが向かうであろう場所の手がかりは見つかっていないが、鋭い眼力の偵察隊員が乱れた雪壁を見つける。スペースウルフの進軍ルートかもしれない。

languages.text: El espíritu máquina se encuentra en pleno rendimiento y preparado para sobrevolar la superficie de este mundo. No se han encontrado pistas sobre el destino al que pretendía llegar Ulfar Pulmón Atronador, pero un explorador avispado divisa varios montículos manipulados que podrían indicar la ruta que tomó el Lobo Espacial.
languages.original_text: The machine spirit is in fine form and is ready to ascend from the world's surface. No clues have been found as to Ulfar Thunderlung's intended destination, but a keen-eyed scout sights several disturbed snowdrifts that may indicate the route taken by the Space Wolf.

traits.locale_text: El espíritu máquina se encuentra en pleno rendimiento y preparado para sobrevolar la superficie de este mundo. No se han encontrado pistas sobre el destino al que pretendía llegar Ulfar Pulmón Atronador, pero un explorador avispado divisa varios montículos manipulados que podrían indicar la ruta que tomó el Lobo Espacial.

languages.text: L'esprit de la machine est pleinement opérationnel et prêt à quitter la surface de la planète. Aucun indice n'a pu être recueilli quant à la destination d'Ulfar, mais un éclaireur attentif repère plusieurs congères affaissées qui pourraient indiquer le chemin emprunté par le Space Wolf.
languages.original_text: The machine spirit is in fine form and is ready to ascend from the world's surface. No clues have been found as to Ulfar Thunderlung's intended destination, but a keen-eyed scout sights several disturbed snowdrifts that may indicate the route taken by the Space Wolf.

traits.locale_text: L'esprit de la machine est pleinement opérationnel et prêt à quitter la surface de la planète. Aucun indice n'a pu être recueilli quant à la destination d'Ulfar, mais un éclaireur attentif repère plusieurs congères affaissées qui pourraient indiquer le chemin emprunté par le Space Wolf.

languages.text: Der Maschinengeist ist in guter Verfassung und bereit, die Oberfläche der Welt zu verlassen. Es gibt keine Hinweise auf Ulfar Donnerlunges Ziel, aber ein scharfsichtiger Späher entdeckt Spuren in Schneeverwehungen, die auf die Route hindeuten könnten, die der Space Wolf eingeschlagen hat.
languages.original_text: The machine spirit is in fine form and is ready to ascend from the world's surface. No clues have been found as to Ulfar Thunderlung's intended destination, but a keen-eyed scout sights several disturbed snowdrifts that may indicate the route taken by the Space Wolf.

traits.locale_text: Der Maschinengeist ist in guter Verfassung und bereit, die Oberfläche der Welt zu verlassen. Es gibt keine Hinweise auf Ulfar Donnerlunges Ziel, aber ein scharfsichtiger Späher entdeckt Spuren in Schneeverwehungen, die auf die Route hindeuten könnten, die der Space Wolf eingeschlagen hat.

languages.text: Makine ruhu iyi durumda, dünya yüzeyinden ayrılmaya hazır hâlde. Ulfar Tufanciğer'in hedef konumu hakkında ipucu bulunamasa da gözü keskin bir keşif eri, kar yığınlarında Uzay Kurdu'nun izlediği yolu gösterebilecek izler tespit ediyor.
languages.original_text: The machine spirit is in fine form and is ready to ascend from the world's surface. No clues have been found as to Ulfar Thunderlung's intended destination, but a keen-eyed scout sights several disturbed snowdrifts that may indicate the route taken by the Space Wolf.

traits.locale_text: Makine ruhu iyi durumdaydı ve dünya yüzeyinden ayrılmaya hazırdı. Ulfar Tufanciğer'in hedef konumu hakkında ipucu bulunamadı ama gözü keskin bir keşif eri, kar yığınlarında Uzay Kurdu'nun izlediği yolu gösterebilecek izler buldu.
